mapper.select: select c.acc_num accNum, c.acc_name accName, c.customer_id customerId , c.ret_date, tn.after_balance balance, c.avaliable_number avaliableNumber from cb_account c join ( select acc_num, after_balance from CB_Transaction where (acc_num, transaction_date) in ( select acc_num, MAX(transaction_date) AS latest_transaction_date from CB_Transaction group by acc_num ) ) tn on c.acc_num = tn.acc_num where c.customer_id = #{customerId}
select c.name name from cb_account a join test_customer c on a.customer_id = c.customer_id where a.acc_num = #{accNum}

select acc_num accNum, acc_name accName, customer_Id customerId, product_num productNum, balance, to_char(reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') regDate, to_char(ret_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') retDate, from test_account where acc_num = #{accNum}
